item.title: akin
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Self-sovereign identity (SSI) platform that allows users to create a portable, reusable digital identity, streamlining the Know-Your-Customer (KYC) process for banks and reducing onboarding friction across the ecosystem.
